name: USD2 (USD2)
description: Project Name: USD2 Tagline: "The only stablecoin that respects the $2 bill." Description: Born from a tweet, fueled by memes, and powered by pure degen energy — USD2 is the first-ever $2 stablecoin in crypto history. Back in 2022, @aeyakovenko said: “no one has built a two dollar bill stable coin.” Well, guess what? We did. USD2 isn’t trying to replace USDC or become the next global reserve. It’s here to fill the $2-sized hole in your portfolio and your heart. Whether you're: Splitting a $4 taco Tipping your favorite shitposter Farming with exact symmetry Or just vibing with a useless but beautiful idea USD2 is here for it. It’s not just a coin. It’s a movement. It’s exactly two dollars. Forever. Probably. #USD2 #TwoDollarRevolution #StableButUnnecessary
